official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for medicaid coverage of acupuncturists' services.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for the professional services of a licensed or certified acupuncturists.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for medicaid coverage of acupuncturists' services.
